title: Artificial Intelligence
description: Want to train neural networks? Program a self-driving car? Teach Cortana, Siri or Alexa what to say next? The Open School of AI is a collection of courses curated from top universities and companies to help learners master all of the skills necessary in the field of Artificial Intelligence.

sections.title: Core Curriculum
sections.description: The Core Curriculum is where you will find the fundamental skills needed to be successful in AI. Whether it's taking a deep dive into Reinforcement Learning or brushing up on your Linear Algebra your journey begins here!

sections.title: Tools and Applications
sections.description: Ready to put all of those hours of studying to use? Here you will find real world practical applications to expand on everything learned in the Core Curriculum. If you are ready to get your hands dirty with TensorFlow or scikit-learn, you've come to the right place!
